thread.title: Gold Ekes Out Longest Winning Streak Since 2011

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Gold Ekes Out Longest Winning Streak Since 2011
text:
Gold prices swung between small gains and losses Thursday with investors assessing minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s latest meeting before eking out a 10th straight session of gains.
Front-month gold for January delivery closed up 0.2% at $1,319.40 a troy ounce, paring earlier losses to notch its longest winning streak since July 2011.
